articles.description: The cameras aboard ESA’s Mars Express have captured a massive crater that looks a lot like a creepy, staring eye.                        ESAAlso read: Strange 'Claw Marks' on Martian Surface Spotted By ESA’s Mars OrbiterThe large city-sized crater measures ar…
articles.content:
The cameras aboard ESAs Mars Express have captured a massive crater that looks a lot like a creepy, staring eye.
